feed.title: Sri Govindaji Gaudiya Matha
feed.subtitle: Gaudiya Vaishnava Temple located in North-West Houston. It is established under the spiritual guidance of Sri Srimad Bhaktivedanta Narayana Goswami Maharaja.

entry.title: Srila Gurudeva‚Äôs Appearance Day
entry.content:
All Glories to Shri shri Guru and Gauranga.
All Glories to Shri shri RadhaGovindaji.

Hare Krishna.
Please attend the divine Appearance day of Srila Gurudev B.V. NARAYAN GOSWAMI MAHARAJ and hear the importance of bonafide GURU and His Glories.
Jan. 29 Wed.
6:30 pm to 9pm
Followed by mahaprasad.

SHRI GURU IS THE CONDENSED MERCY OF LORD KRISHNA.

Haribol.

entry.title: Srila Gurudev‚Äôs Disappearance Day Festival
entry.content:
All Glories to Shri shri Guru and Gauranga.
All Glories to Shri shri RadhaGovindaji.

Hare Krishna.
Please attend the divine disppearance day of Srila Gurudev and hear His Glories.
Monday, December 23 - 6:30pm to 8:45pm.

GURU NISHTHA IS THE BACKBONE OF BHAKTI.

Haribol.

entry.title: Diwali & Govardhan Puja
entry.content:
All glories to Shri Shri Guru and Gauranga.
All glories to Shri Shri Radha Govindji.

Hare Krishna.

Shri Govindji Gaudiya Matha invites all the Houston Vasis to celebrate Diwali and Govardhan puja.

Oct. 31. Thursday
Diwali Eve. Candle light Arati - 7pm

Nov. 2 Saturday.
Govardhan puja - Anna-kuta Mahotsav.
5pm to 7:30pm.
HariNaam sankirtan, Maha Arati followed by big feast - Maha Prasad.

Special Note: This is the day in the whole year that everyone is welcome to cook and bring as many dishes as you want in a bowl size quantity.
Absolutely no onion no garlic.
Cooking pot should be clean preferably new pot.

Or you can bring
DRY items like snacks, dry fruits and dry sweets.

Please bring your dishes max by 6:30pm.

Please come with your family, friends and relatives for
Anna-kuta darshan , Thakur ji s darshan and divine blessings.
To serve in this very auspicious celebrations,
Please post this message to all your groups, Facebook page, websites etc.

Temple address:
16628 kieth harrow Blvd.
Houston TX 77084
832 464 4686
www.sggm.org

Thanks
Haribol.
entry.summary: Diwali Eve: Thursday, Oct 31st @ 7pmGovardhan Puja: Saturday, Nov 2nd @ 5pm

entry.title: Sharad Purnima
entry.content:
Disappearance Day of Sri Param Gurudev

Srila Bhakti Pragyana Keshava Goswami Maharaj

All Glories to Shri shri Guru and Gauranga.
All Glories to Shri shri RadhaGovindaji.

In the honor of Achraya kesri Sri Param Gurudev Srila Bhakti pragyana Keshav Goswami Maharaj, there will be a program at SGGM.

Please join and hear the Glories of Kartik month and Srila Param Gurudev.

Maha Prasad will be served.

Haribol
entry.summary: Disappearance day of Sri Param GurudevSrila Bhakti Pragyana Keshava Goswami MaharajThursday, Oct 17 @ 6:30pm - 8:45pm

entry.title: Sri Radha Astami
entry.content:
All glories to Shri Shri Guru and Gauranga.
All glories to Shri Shri Radha Govindji.

SRI GOVINDJI GAUDIYA MATH IS CELEBRATING the most glorious and auspicious festival of the year: Sri Radha Ashtami on September 11 Wed.
6pm - 8:30pm.

On this day we celebrate the appearance day of Sri Radha Rani, the eternal shakti of supreme Lord Sri Krishna. We will have ecstatic Kirtan, Janam lila katha, and Maha Arati. Maha-Prasadam will be served.

This is a very devotional and spiritual day as we celebrate the divine potency of Lord Krishna, Sri Radha Rani. Come and celebrate with your family and take the blessings of this auspicious day.

TO sponsor the festival OR TO GET MORE INFORMATION, PLEASE CALL 832-464-4686 AND CHECK OUR WEBSITE SGGM.ORG

Adress: 16628 Kieth Harrow Blvd Houston tx 77084

SPECIAL NOTE : anyone is welcome to bring a basket (CHAAV) of shringar items like bangles, bindi , perfume, sindoor and chunris. Fruits, dry fruits, dry sweets etc. To offer to Srimati Radhika Rani. All the prasad will be distributed after offering.

Thanks Haribol

Please invite everyone and spread this message as much as possible and post everywhere.

Haribol.

Vedic school registration

(Please note the sggm.org should be opened using a laptop)

Hare Krishna!

entry.title: Three Big Celebrations
entry.content:
üåπAll glories to Shri Shri Guru and Gauranga. All glories to Shri Shri Radha Govindji.üåπ

Hare Krishna. üôè

‚ú®THREE BIG CELEBRATIONS:‚ú®

SRI GOVINDJI GAUDIYA MATH IS CELEBRATING THREE most glorious and auspicious
festivals of the year:

üå∑1. SRI KRISHNA JANMASHTAMI

MONDAY, August 26
7pm to Midnight üå∑

On this day we celebrate the advent of Lord Sri Krishna on this earth around 5000 years ago. We will have ecstatic Kirtan, abhishek, Janam-lila Katha and Midnight Maha Arati.

This is a very auspicious, exciting and entertaining event for the whole family, so please come and take blessings from the merciful Lord and participate in the celebration!

You will have the opportunity to perform pooja with your own thalis.

TO sponsor pooja thali or for festivals Sponsorship OR TO GET MORE INFORMATION, PLEASE CALL 832-464-4686 AND CHECK OUR WEBSITE SGGM.ORG.

Please be a part of these celebrations and be rewarded by spreading this message further and further.

üåº 2. NAND UTSAV
SUNDAY, September 1
11am to 1pm
FOLLOWED BY MAHAPRASAD. üåº

‚ù§Ô∏è 3. SHRI RADHASHTAMI
DIVINE APPEARANCE DAY OF SHRI RADHARANI
WEDNESDAY, September 11
6:30pm to 8:30pm‚ù§Ô∏è

FOLLOWED BY MAHA PRASAD.

Thanks.
Haribol.üôè
entry.summary: Janmastami - Aug 26 • Nandostav - Sep 1 • Radhastami - Sep 11
